original_title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart - Le Nozze di Figaro (Netherland Chamber Orchertsa)
overview: "Le Nozze di Figaro" is one of the most successful comic operas ever.  Director David BÃ¶sch is a born storyteller. he likes to focus on the classics, and is known for his poetic approach. In this new production of "Le Nozze di Figaro", the hectic, bubbly story of Figaro's eventful wedding party is visually interpreted in a revovling stage set.
title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart - Le Nozze di Figaro (Netherland Chamber Orchertsa)
